name: Air Rider (V Slice demo)
description:
check this page if the games give the "Your browser does not allow to read local files."

In a world where everything is done online, people started buying things on the internet and that lead to a big question... Who's gonna deliver the orders? 

The Air Rider!

CREDITS

Rannah Derrick, the game image is his and if he will not support the use of his image as inspiration of my game, I'll remove it right away.
